content: कुशल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Right, proper, good, auspicious; <ls>Śi. 16. 41</ls>; <ls>Bg. 18. 10.</ls> {@--2@} Happy, prosperous. {@--3@} Able, skilful, clever, proficient, well-versed; with <ab>loc.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>; दंडनीत्यां च कुशलं <ls>Y. 1. 313</ls>, <ls n="Y.">2. 181</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 190</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 12.</ls> --लं {@--1@} Welfare, a happy or prosperous condition, happiness; पप्रच्छ कुशलं राज्ये राज्याश्रममुनिं मुनिः <ls>R. 1. 58</ls>; अव्यापन्नः कुशलमबले पृच्छति त्वां <ls>Me. 101</ls>; अपि कुशलं भवतः ‘are you doing well’ (how do you do?). {@--2@} Virtue. {@--3@} Cleverness, ability. --लः An epithet of Śiva.
